ips_n_tortuga.name: IPS‑N Tortuga
ips_n_tortuga.special: WATCHDOG Co-Pilot - All your ranged weapons gain Threat 3. And you may make attacks of opportunity against targets entering your threat zone.

horus_goblin.name: HORUS Goblin
horus_goblin.special: Symbiosis – As a action, attach to a willing allied mech (larger than yours) to occupy their space. While attached, you gain hard cover but share conditions with host. Host may use your Fittings, Saves, and Tech Attack. You take actions during host's turn instead of your own. Lasts until you detach (free action) or either mech is Stunned.

horus_gorgon.name: HORUS Gorgon
horus_gorgon.special: Extrude Basilisk - As an action you project a horrifying basilisk, a visual data-pattern that is incredibly harmful to NHPs and electronic systems, and hard to look at even for humans. Hostile characters must succeed on a Tech save before attacking you or any allied characters within range 3. On a failure, they become Stunned until the end of their next turn. Each character can only be Stunned by this effect once.

cns_qilin.name: CNS Qilin
cns_qilin.special: Benevolent Resonance – Allies within 3 gain +1 AC. Once per turn you may redirect a hostile's attack to yourself.

cns_baihu.name: CNS Baihu
cns_baihu.special: Triumphant Roar – When you destroy or crit a target, all hostiles within 10 must save vs Mental or become take -2 to hit for 1 round.

cns_zhuque.name: CNS Zhuque
cns_zhuque.special: Gravity Stabilizers – Weapons you fire ignore Brace.

dm_chevalier.name: DM Chevalier
dm_chevalier.special: Cavalry Charge – If you move 3+ before making a melee attack, gain +4 to hit and +4 damage on that attack.

dm_casemate.name: DM Casemate
dm_casemate.special: Fortified Bastion – As a reaction, half all damage against you until your next turn. You lose your Action on that next turn.

dm_paladin.name: DM Paladin
dm_paladin.special: Riposte – When a melee attack misses you, make a Melee attack against the attacker.

nf_cid.name: NF Cid
nf_cid.special: Flux‑Veil – When you move, you become Invisible and ignore engagement until the start of your next turn.

nf_cortes.name: NF Cortes
nf_cortes.special: Energy-Matter Regeneration – Recover 1 HP of Overheat damage per round.

nf_tercio.name: NF Tercio
nf_tercio.special: Phalanx Protocol – If you haven't moved this turn, gain resistance to all damage until the end of your next turn.

ssc_swallowtail.name: SSC Swallowtail
ssc_swallowtail.special: Integrated Cloak – At the end of its turn, the Swallowtail becomes Invisible if it hasn’t moved that turn. This lasts until it moves or takes a reaction, or until the start of its next turn.

ssc_deaths_head.name: SSC Death's Head
ssc_deaths_head.special: Mark for Death – As an action, mark a target. When you score a hit by 10 or more against the marked target, deal additional damage equal to d12 × your weapon's hard points.
